title: Bubble Shuttle v1.0.7
description:
"I always wanted to be a cosmonaut so that I can fly in the vastness of space and explore everything. But I have an idea. Laika, help me! I will build my own rocket with propulsion of soap bubbles. 

I want to fly as high as possible."
Fly the rocket of the little cosmonaut and discover with him the exciting endless space. Many great, funny characters and objects are waiting for you.
An enchanting game for in between with inspiring quite 
simply core mechanics. 

Just tap anywhere on the screen to accelerate. Let go, so that the rocket falls back. Avoid to hit a snag in this way. Beware of the Space Slime that will slow you down, but keep an eye out for the Golden Shield. It will make you invulnerable for a short time.

How high will you come? Compete with other players and make it into the Hall of Fame. Be among the Top 30 players in the world and set your personal record!

Bubble Shuttle is perhaps a little easier than Doodle Jump, Space Jump, Rocket - Craze or Rocket Space, but if you like one of these Games, so give Bubble Shuttle a chance.

GAME FEATURES:

- no advertising
- android exclusive/only for android
- unique soundtrack
- simply core mechanics
- addictive gameplay
- cute, refreshing setting
- numerous cute enemies and objects, that cross your way

What's New:

We presenting you a tiny and easy to play Casual Game.
